attributes.review: Worst app ever. Was hoping to get reliable news and updates on Trump’s re-election but it’s all racist sexist homophobic propaganda. No more Cheetos for me.
attributes.title: Worst App Ever

attributes.review: I tried to find the directions to a trump rally and the instructions were unclear and I found my self in a North Korea labor camp.
attributes.title: North Korea

attributes.review: when i first downloaded this app, a horrible smell erupted from my iphone 8. it wafted through my home and hit my cat straight in the heart. soon after, she was rushed to the emergency room where she later passed away❤️
attributes.title: this app killed my cat

attributes.review: i was so excited to download this app, but then it started blasting pr0n? is this what our president is into ?:! i am truly disgusted. it then showed me a slideshow of lilhoodie, zoe laverne, and kaitlyn bennett, while in the background there was a chant that said "zoe chase and kaitlyn are our lord and savior." i am truly scared
attributes.title: trump 2020✨ but aliven't

attributes.review: This app took weeks to download and it was not worth it at all!
attributes.title: Horrible app!

attributes.review: Terrible app, don’t waste the space on your phone

attributes.review: This app is probably the worst thing I have ever downloaded!

attributes.review: The app itself is horrible and disgusting. The platform supports a man who is racist, homophobic, and many other negative ideals. DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!!

attributes.review: the fact that trump obviously doesn’t know what he’s doing, makes me second guess getting this app. i refuse to after hearing all the bad that he has done. it’s not okay, and should not be continued
attributes.title: it’s a no for trump!

attributes.review: The app gave my phone coronavirus I was shooketh I threw my phone into my neighbor’s yard now what am I supposed to do ride on a bike please help me!
